data.name: Dungeon Tavern
data.detailed_description:
You May Also Like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1862660/garageVAMP/?curator_clanid=35401591


About the Game

Want to find out what it's like to BANG the things that go BUMP in the night? This sizzling sexy Scenario Simulation puts a pair of do-gooder adventurers right in the heart of a horny nest of monstergirls and monsterguys. Be the one to determine what happens to them!



Two brave adventurers set out on a journey to defeat the demon king- only to find themselves locked deep within the dungeons of Darkwood Tavern. Holding them captive are a murderer's row of monstrous mal-adapts. Our heroes are about to find out that there's more to life than quests and heroics, as their gracious hosts lead them down a debauched rabbit hole that will change their lives forever.



  • TAKE CONTROL OF THE TALE-
    You're in control! The monsters and adventurers, you guide their actions to shape the story!

  • ENGAGE IN EROTIC ESCAPADES-
    Learn how to sweet talk and seduce in order to unlock animated sex scenes!

  • MEET THE PATRONS OF DARKWOOD TAVERN-
    Drow, ghosts, stitched constructs- a menagerie of monstrous men and women await!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
ChromaBeat contains adult themes and content that is only suitable for certain ages.

All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.
